Articles.Content:
Will my PC play KSP 2?

My CPU is: Intel(R) Pentium(R) CPU G4600 @ 3.60GHz, and I am just using the on board graphics.

 I have16GB of Ram too.

Will it play the game at all?, or would it just look worse, or be laggy etc?

Thanks.

Forget it. Onboard graphics don't seem to be able to run the game.

Check the minimum game requirements and try to meet them if you really want to join the EA

Shame. I loved KSP 1, and then I got it on console too, but it's way more clunky to control vs a mouse and keyboard.
But i'm not forking out hundreds for a graphics card to play one game, ( I don't game on PC).
I'll probably have to wait for the PS5 version, (however long that will take!), and see how it plays on console.
